get.summary: Get data for AmmFundingOrder, for given token and amount.
get.description:
In order to get data for a deposit order, provide one of the tokens and the amount you want to deposit. The response will contain information on how much of the other pool token you need to deposit and how many LP tokens you will get in return.
In order to get data for a withdrawal, set token to pools LP token and provide the amount of it which you wish to exchange for pool tokens. The response will conatin information about how much of the pool tokens you will get in return.
Data returned by this end point can be used to actually request a deposit/withdrawal via POST app/fundingOrders.

parameters.description: Base64 of {signature, nonce} JSON representation
parameters.name: authorization

get.summary: Request information regarding the trading volume of a specific address for the last 30 days. The request returns the overall trading volume details for all tokens in USD as well as the trading volume per token. Results are cached for 60 minutes.

parameters.description: This nonce which used to provide the time until which this nonce is valid. It is presented as seconds since epoch.
parameters.name: nonce

parameters.description: The signature obtained by signing the nonce with your private ethereum key.
parameters.name: signature

get.summary: This returns a user ranking by overall trading volume quoted in USD. If the parameters startDate and endDate are provided, the ranking includes only trading volume within that window of time.

parameters.description: The start date and time (Unix timestamp in milliseconds) for which the trade volumes are requested. If startDate and endDate are not provided, it returns the volume ranking if all time.
parameters.name: startDate

parameters.description: The end date and time (Unix timestamp in milliseconds) for which events are requested.If startDate and endDate are not provided, it returns the volume ranking if all time.
parameters.name: endDate

default.description: Ranked output of all trading volumes for all the tokens.

get.summary: Request information regarding the trading volume of a specific address for the last 24 hours. The request returns the overall trading volume details for all tokens in USD as well as the trading volume per token. Results are cached for 2 minutes.

default.description: Returns the overall trading volume details of a specific address for all tokens in USD as well as the trading volume per trading pair fot the last 24 hours.

post.summary: Submit AMM fundingOrder. Used to deposit or withdrawal liquidity.
Add a list of airdops

This is used to retrieve the total and active balances of a user per token. Active balance is the balance that is currently available. Total balance (specified as balance) is the sum of all the balances including those locked for trading.

default.description: Returns the total, available and locked balances of a user per token.

post.summary: This is an authenticated endpoint used to retrieve deposits. A token can be specified to get deposits for a specific token. The limit of deposits returned is 1000.

parameters.description: Date of the last deposit returned.
parameters.name: startDate

parameters.description: Limit of deposits that will be returned. With a maximum limit of 1000.
parameters.name: limit

default.description: Returns the list of deposits. A token can be specified to get deposits for a specific token.

post.summary: This is endpoint is used to retrieve the details for a specific order using the order ID.

default.description: Returns details relating to a particular order.

post.summary: This endpoint is used to retrieve all pending withdrawals. If a token is specified, withdrawals pertaining to only that particular token are provided.

default.description: Successful

post.summary: Used to get all configured permissions for the authenticated user
Returns the DeversiFi application and user configuration details.

default.description: Returns the overall trading volume details for all tokens in USD as well as the trading volume per trading pair.

This endpoint is used to retrieve details relating to a particular withdrawal.
Returns whether the user already received registration compensation.
This endpoints allows to retrieve details on all open orders.
This method is used to retrieve a list of all past orders for a user. This includes executed trades, as well as expired and cancelled orders. The limit of orders returned is 1000.

parameters.name: startDate

parameters.description: Limit of orders that will be returned. With a maximum limit of 1000.
parameters.name: limit

post.summary: Returns the encrypted Stark Trading Key.

default.description: Returns the encrypted Stark Trading key.

post.summary: Used to set a specific permission for a given user
This method is used to retrieve user's count of filled orders.
An authenticated endpoint used to retrieve a list of user's past withdrawals. This includes ready, completed, as well as cancelled withdrawals. The limit of withdrawals returned is 1000.

parameters.name: startDate

parameters.description: Limit of withdraws that will be returned. With a maximum limit of 1000.

post.summary: This is used to retrieve the total and active balances of a user per token. Active balance is the balance that is currently available. Total balance (specified as balance) is the sum of all the balances including those locked for trading.

parameters.description: The ETH address of a potential user
parameters.name: userEthAddress

401.description: User has not authorized the use of this endpoint for their address

onChainTotalUsd.description: total USD equivalent of the on-chain assets

exchangeTotalUsd.description: total USD equivalent of the exchange assets

totalUsd.description: total USD equivalent of both on-chain and exchange assets

totalItems.description: Total number of items matching the query

_id.description: Unique identifier representing the deposit or withdrawal

type.description: Whether the transaction is a deposit, a classic withdrawal or a fast withdrawal

amount.description: Amount deposited or withdrawn

transactionHash.description: Hash of the Ethereum transaction leading to L1 balance debit or credit

date.description: Date and time deposit or withdrawal

sourceOrRecipient.description: Originator of the deposit or recipient of the withdrawal

gateway.description: Set when operation used a gateway. Corresponds to a chain identifier

fillId.description: Unique identifier representing the fill event

orderId.description: Unique identifier of the order associated with the fill

symbol.description: Symbol for the order associated with the fill

fillAmount.description: Amount filled (negative amount for a sell event, positive for a buy event)

orderAmount.description: Initial amount for the placed order associated with the fill

date.description: Date and time of the fill event

orderCreationDate.description: Date and time at which the order associated with the fill event was placed

orderType.description: Type of the order associated with the fill event

orderActive.description: Whether the order associated with the fill event is still active

orderCanceled.description: Whether the order associated with the fill event was canceled

amount.description: Amount transfered (effective amount received by the recipient)

feeAmount.description: Transfer fee amount (in transfer token units)

date.description: Date and time of the transfer

vaultIdSell.description: The vault ID of the seller.

vaultIdBuy.description: The vault ID of the buyer.

amountSell.description: The total amount to be sold.

amountBuy.description: The total amount to be bought.

tokenSell.description: The Stark token ID for the token being sold.

tokenBuy.description: The Stark token ID for the token being bought.

totalUSDVolume.description: The total trade volume in terms of USD.

startDate.description: The start date and time for the volume presented.

endDate.description: The end date and time for the volume presented.

USDValue.description: The trading volume for the address quoted in USD.

totalUSDVolume.description: The total trade volume in terms of USD.
The total trade volume in terms of USD.

amount.description: DVF airdrop eligible amount

requested.description: Has this claim been already requested

liquidity_locked.description: The total liquidity in terms of USD.
The total liquidity in terms of USD.

estimatedTime.description: The number of seconds until the batch is sent to be processed and broadcast to the blockchain.

averageTime.description: The configured number of seconds between batches.

finalisedBatchPendingConfirmation.description: True if the previous batch has been created but still pending confirmation on the blockchain.

feeQuantised.description: Fast withdrawal fee as quantised amount of token to be withdrawn.

feeBaseUnits.description: Fast withdrawal fee as base units of token to be withdrawn.

maxAmountQuantised.description: Max amount as quantised amount of token to be withdrawn.

maxAmountBaseUnits.description: Max amount as base units of token to be withdrawn.

maker.description: The fee basis points for maker orders (adding bids or offers to the order book).

taker.description: The fee basis points for taker orders (removing liquidity from the order book).

address.description: The Ethereum address of the user verified by nonce and signature.

changePerSecondUSD.description: Rate at which gas savings increase per second

ethAddress.description: The ethereum public address of the user.

balanceUsd.description: It is the sum of all user balances converted to USD.

getGasPriceResponse.description: Range of gas prices for on chain confirmation speed

fast.description: Gas price in Wei for quickest onchain transaction confirmation.

average.description: Average gas price in Wei for average onchain transaction speed.

cheap.description: Low gas price in Wei and very slow transaction speed.

fastWait.description: The approximate time for a transaction confirmation when using fast as the gas price.

averageWait.description: The approximate time for a transaction confirmation when using average as the gas price.

cheapWait.description: The approximate time for a transaction confirmation when using cheap as the gas price.

TotalUSDValue.description: The total trade volume in terms of USD.

startDate.description: The start date and time for the volume presented.

score.description: balance for this address/token at block number

amount.description: The trading volume for the address

value.description: Total value locked for a particular date

starkKey.description: The public stark key for the user registered with <targetEthAddress>

totalSupply.description: Total xDVF balance of users on exchange

votingPower.description: Percentage of amount compared to total balance

isRegisteredOnChain.description: Whether the user is registered with Starkware.

price.description: Last transacted price of base currency based on given quote currency.

_id.description: Order Id, this can be used as orderId when calling cancelOrder or getOrder.

symbol.description: The trading pair symbol for this order.

amount.description: Original order size placed.

amountOrig.description: Same as amount, included for backward compatibility.

tokenBuy.description: Token being bought as part of this exchange order.

totalBought.description: Total tokens bought, in quantized units.

tokenSell.description: Token being sold as part of this exchange order.

tokenSellLockedBalance.description: Amount of tokens to be sold, locked when order was submitted (quantized units).

totalSold.description: Total tokens sold, in quantized units.

type.description: Type of the order. Currently, "EXCHANGE LIMIT" is the only type that is supported.

averagePrice.description: Average price at which the order has been settled.

feeRate.description: The max fee rate applicable for the order.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the order was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the order was last updated.

activatedAt.description: The date and time when the order was activated.

lastFillTime.description: The date and time when the last fill occurred for this order.

totalSold.description: Total tokens sold, in quantized units.

type.description: Type of the order. Currently, "EXCHANGE LIMIT" is the only type that is supported.

averagePrice.description: Average price at which the order has been settled.

feeRate.description: The max fee rate applicable for the order.

readyToWithdrawOnChain.description: The withdrawal is ready to be requested.

vaultIdSell.description: The vault ID of the seller.

vaultIdBuy.description: The vault ID of the buyer.

nonce.description: Nonce value.

platform.description: Platform on which the order was initiated

cid.description: Optional custom order ID that could be set when placing order and used later to retrieve order. This ID is unique per user (user A and B can each have an order with cid = AAA, but the same user cannot have two orders with the same cid)

type.description: The type of order. Currently only EXCHANGE_LIMIT is accepted.

amount.description: The token amount to be traded. Will be rounded up to 8 decimal places.

price.description: The cost per unit. Will be rounded down to 5 significant digits.
